body_en: One example of a crime that the Russian media has repeatedly blamed on "Nazis" is attacks on their own civilian targets. One such case was [the air attack on a theatre in Mariupol](https://www.amnesty.org/en/latest/news/2022/06/ukraine-deadly-mariupol-theatre-strike-a-clear-war-crime-by-russian-forces-new-investigation/) on March 16, 2022. Civilians were hiding in the theatre. The Russian Defense Ministry reported that Russian aircraft did not strike the drama theatre in Mariupol, and instead accused Ukraineâ€™s  Azov battalion of bombing it.
